entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Quaqtaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:11 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quaqtaq Airport 2:00 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: -16.5°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -18.9°C
Wind: ENE 49 km/h gust 62 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 1:10 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending near midnight then snow and blowing snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 1:10 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 1:10 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
